section.name: Welcome to Wicket Groovy Integration
section.p: The Wicket Groovy Integration project allows you to use Groovy (a JVM scripting language), to create Wicket pages. Instead of creating Java classes to match your HTML, you create Groovy classes.
The Wicket Groovy integration is part of the Wicket Stuff project. This Wicket powered project provides non-core components to the Wicket project.
